title: Kaximil Women's Crew Neck Long Sleeve Corset Mini Dress Ruffle Hem Short Party Club Dresses
description: This long sleeve mini dress is super soft, breathable, flowy at the bottom, a super flattering silhouette
This club short dresses feature crew neck, long sleeve, above knee mini length, ruffle hem, ruched basque waist

The corset mini dress is suitable for party, club, cocktail, night out, christmas, dinner, bridal shower, homecoming, going out, vacation, birthday, workout, graduation, evening. It can easily be dressed up or down, making it perfect for a variety of occasions
Size: S=USA 4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16-18, the casual dress is perfect for spring, winter, fall
Washing Care: washing by hand or machine, do not bleach
